items.value:
Hey i am Romana!

Kelly told me that you will visit me!
She told me you are a smart person right?
Do you have the Birthday Cake for me?
Get sure you have 3x free Slot within your Inventory!
yes Romana, here is the Cake!
Err.. i will come back later!

Oh man, this cake is huge!
Here you will definitely need some coffee!

From now on you can count me among your friends.
Visit me again if you need entertainment.

But now please bring Kelly this invitation card!

You get: 1x Birthday Invitation Card, 1x Metro Ticket, 3x Coffee
will do! See you soon Romana..

No Cake?!?! : ((((

Please visit Kelly at the Market and bring me the Cake!
Uh.. i will try my best!
